name: Kung Fu Panda 2
description:
Kung Fu is at risk of being gone forever! In an original story, players are plunged into the video game after the movie ends. At the summons of the Kung Fu council, comprised of masters Shifu, Croc and Ox, players must help Po and the Furious Five defeat looting wolves, powerful gorillas and clans of sneaky Komodo Dragons, all in the name of Kung Fu!

Features

• "Punch and kick" with a flick of the stylus as you defend Gongmen City.
• Play with baby Po in exclusive mini-games!
• Customise your game with creations drawn by you!
